name: Trouble in Otherworld
text: Give to the Brunnhilde player. Valkyrie cannot attack the enemy with Death-Glow attached. Alter-Ego Action: Spend [energy][mental] resources → remove Trouble in Otherworld from the game.

name: Enchantress
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck, discard pile, and set-aside area for a copy of Seduced and attach it to your identity. (Shuffle.)

flavor: Behind Amora's charm lies a cruel ambition and the power to subdue those in her way.
name: Powerful Enchantments
text:
Hinder 1[per_hero].
Players cannot discard attachments that are attached to friendly characters.

name: Beguiled
text: Treat attached ally as an [enthralled] minion with a blank text box. Attached minion's SCH is equal to its printed THW and it does not take consequential damage. When Revealed: Attach to the ally with the highest cost without Beguiled attached. Attached ally engages its controller. Otherwise, this card gains surge.

name: Seduced
text: Attach to your identity. You cannot make basic attacks or play [[attack]] events. Alter-Ego Action: Spend [energy][mental] resources → discard this card.
